verses.text: PEA ko e me‘a ki he ngaahi taimi mo e ngaahi kuonga, kāinga, koe‘uma‘ā ha‘amau tohi atu.
He ‘oku mou ‘ilo kānokano, ko e hoko mai ‘a e ‘aho ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku hangē ko e ha‘u ‘a e kaiha‘a ‘i he pō.
Tokaange ha taimi ‘oku nau pehē, ‘Oku tau lelei mo tu‘umālie, fakafokifā ‘oku tu‘u mai ‘a mala, ‘o hangē ko e langā ki he fefine feitama: pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te nau hao.
Ka tala‘ehai ‘oku mou ‘i he po‘uli, kāinga, ke mo‘utāmakia kimoutolu ‘e he ‘aho ko ia, ‘o hangē ha kaiha‘a.
He ko e fānau kimoutolu kotoa pē ‘a e maama, mo e fānau ‘a e ‘aho; ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a e pō kitaua, ‘uma‘ā ‘a e po‘uli.
‘Āua; pea ke ‘oua te ta mohe ‘o hangē ko e kakai kehe, ka ta ‘ā pē ‘o faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he konā.
He ko kinautolu ‘oku mohe ‘oku mohe ‘i he pō; pea ko kinautolu ‘oku konā ‘oku konā ‘i he pō.
Ka ko kitaua ko e kakai ‘o e ‘aho; ko ia, ta faka‘ehi‘ehi mu‘a mei he konā. Kae‘uma‘ā kuo ta ‘ai ‘a e kofu tau ko e tui mo e ‘ofa, pea mo e ‘amanaki mo‘ui mo‘ota tatā tau.
He na‘e ‘ikai ke tu‘utu‘uni kitaua ‘e he ‘Otua ke houhau‘ia, ka ke lava‘i mai ‘a e fakamo‘ui ‘i hota ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi;
‘a ia na‘a ne pekia koe‘uhi ko kitaua, koe‘uhi, pe ‘oku ta ‘ā, pe ‘oku ta mohe, kehe ke ta fakataha ‘i he mo‘ui feangai mo ia.
Ko ia, ke mou fetokoni‘aki kimoutolu, pea fefai‘aki homou langa hake, hangē ā foki ‘oku mou fai.
Pea ko eni ‘oku mau kole kiate kimoutolu, kāinga, ke mou ‘ilo ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakafitefita‘a ‘iate kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ‘anautolu homou pule‘i ‘i he ‘Eiki, mo homou tākitala‘i.
Pea ke mou tokanga ‘ofa ‘aupito ‘aupito kiate kinautolu, koe‘uhi ko si‘enau ngāue. Mou fekoekoe‘i.
Pea ko eni, kāinga, ‘oku mau enginaki atu ke mou tākitala‘i ‘a e kau maumau tu‘utu‘uni; lōtaki ‘a e lotosi‘i; poupou ‘a e vaivai; ke mou anga mokomoko ki he kakai kotoa pē.
Vakai ke ‘oua na‘a ai ha taha ‘e totongi ‘a e kovi ‘a ha taha ‘aki ha kovi; kaekehe ke mou tuli ai pē ki he me‘a ‘oku lelei ma‘a e taha, pea ma‘a e kakai kotoa pē.
Fiefia ma‘u ai pē.
Lotu ta‘etuku.
Fakafeta‘i ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē, he ko e tu‘utu‘uni ia ‘a e ‘Otua ma‘amoutolu ‘ia Kalaisi Sīsū.
‘Oua ‘e fu‘ifu‘i ‘a e Laumālie:
‘oua ‘e ta‘etoka‘i ‘a e ngaahi malanga palofisai;
ka mou sivi kotoa pē: ‘ilonga pē ‘a e lelei, puke ma‘u ia;
‘ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku fa‘ahinga mo e kovi, faka‘ehi‘ehi mei ai.

Pea ko e ‘Afio ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e nonga, ‘ofa ke ne fakamā‘oni‘oni‘i faka‘āufuli ‘a kimoutolu! ‘Io, ‘i he hoko mai ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa kuo haofaki homou laumālie, mo e loto, mo e sino, ‘o kakato mo ta‘emele!
Ko ia ‘oku ne ui kimoutolu ki ai, ko e Toko Taha ia ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea, pea te ne fai foki ‘a e me‘a ni.
Kāinga, mou hūfia kimautolu.
Mou fekita ki he kāinga kotoa pē ‘aki ha ‘uma tapu.
Ko e ‘Eiki ē ‘oku ou fekau atu ai kiate kimoutolu, ke mou lau ‘a e ‘ipiseli ni ki he kāinga kotoa pē.
Ko e kelesi ‘a hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘ofa ke ‘iate kimoutolu ia!
